title: Integrative Modalities
author: Laura Beil
description: Integrative medicine can be described by five categories, including mind/body, energy and ancient medical systems.
cleaned_text: described by five categories, including mind/body, energy and ancient medical systems. Although integrative medicine includes many approaches to complement conventional therapies, according to the Society for Integrative Oncology they can be described by five categories: 1. BIOLOGIC-BASED PRACTICES Herbal remedies Vitamins Diet and nutritional supplements 2. MIND/BODY TECHNIQUES Meditation Guided imagery Expressive arts therapies 3. MANIPULATIVE AND BODY-BASED PRACTICES Massage Reflexology Exercise and physical activity 4. ENERGY THERAPIES Healing touch techniques Reiki Qigong Magnetic field therapy 5. ANCIENT MEDICAL SYSTEMS Traditional Chinese medicine Ayurvedic medicine Acupuncture
